authors.author: John J. Husband William P. MacKay

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Thine the glory!
Hallelujah! Amen!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Thine the glory!
Revive us again.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We praise Thee, O God,
For the Son of Thy love;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
For Jesus, who died
And is now gone above.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We praise Thee, O God,
For Thy Spirit of light,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Who has shown us our Savior
And scattered our night.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
All glory and praise
To the Lamb that was slain,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Who has borne all our sins
And hath cleansed every stain.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Revive us again;
Fill each heart with Thy love;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
May each soul be rekindled
With fire from above.
